mapper.insert:
select uuid from social where ROWNUM = 1
insert into Member(userid,profile_img,nickname,area,grade,exp,manner,fgenre1,fgenre2,fgenre3,fgame1,fgame2,fgame3,attend,late,absent) values (#{userid},#{profile_img},#{nickname},#{area_code},0,0,0,#{fgenre1},#{fgenre2},#{fgenre3},#{fgame1},#{fgame2},#{fgame3},0,0,0)
